title: Tree Pose 1
script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

title: Tree Pose 2
script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

title: Tree Pose 3
script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

title: Test Pose
script: Inhale, lift your hands to the the sky. Exhale, ground your feet to the top of your mat.

title: Downward Dog Pose
script: Starting on all fours, lifting the hips, and straightening the legs to form an inverted V.
